titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to permit the next of kin of a deceased veteran to designate the style of flag to be furnished at the burial of such veteran.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension, Insurance and Memorial Affairs.
Executive Comment Requested from Veterans' Affairs.

committee.subcommittee: Compensation, Pension, Insurance, and Memorial Affairs
committee.name: House Veterans' Affairs

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Permits the next of kin or the close friend or associate who is entitled to receive the flag of a deceased veteran to designate the style of flag, draped or mounted, to be furnished at the burial of such veteran.
